name: CU-T3
description:
[Full Screen Reccomended]

CU-T3

Unit CU-T3 is a soon to be discarded AI robot. "The Creator" didn't deem him fit of "The Project" and wants to discard him.

Help CU-T3 to rescue his friends while you discover his story through recorded bits scattered around the facility and stored on collectable floppy disks, in this short story platform game made for the Wowie Gamejam 2022!

Controls

Move with A and D. Jump with Space.

Click on CU-T3 to open his context menu to give him action, if possible.
